R0_Diabetes.name: Q8_2_1_1
R0_Diabetes.question: Have you ever been diagnosed with diabetes?
R0_Diabetes.description: Indicates whether the participant reports a medical diagnosis of diabetes at any time prior to questionnaire completion.

R0_DiabetesAge.name: Q8_2_2
R0_DiabetesAge.question: If yes, at what age was diabetes diagnosed?
R0_DiabetesAge.description: Participant's age (in completed years) when diabetes was first diagnosed (if applicable).

R0_TreatedWithInsulin.name: Q8_2_3_1
R0_TreatedWithInsulin.question: Are you treated with insulin?
R0_TreatedWithInsulin.description: Whether the participant is currently receiving insulin treatment.

R0_ThyroidDisease.name: Q8_3_1
R0_ThyroidDisease.question: Have you ever been diagnosed with any thyroid disease or thyroid problems?
R0_ThyroidDisease.description: Indicates whether the participant reports any thyroid condition diagnosed by a clinician.

R0_ThyroidDiseaseType.name: Q8_3_Yes_1
R0_ThyroidDiseaseType.question: If yes, what was the disease or problem? (Hyperthyroidism, Hypothyroidism, Thyroid cyst(s), Other)
R0_ThyroidDiseaseType.description: Coded type of thyroid disease reported by the participant, when thyroid disease is present.

R0_ThyroidDiseaseOther.name: Q8_3_other
R0_ThyroidDiseaseOther.question: Please specify the other thyroid disease, if applicable.
R0_ThyroidDiseaseOther.description: Free-text specification when the thyroid disease type is â€˜Other'.

ThyroidTreatment.name: ThyroidTreatment
ThyroidTreatment.description: Per-episode details for thyroid drug treatment (up to 2 episodes as captured in the instrument).

R0_ThyroidDisease_Med.name: R0_ThyroidDisease_Med
R0_ThyroidDisease_Med.question: What is the name of the [ordinal] drug treatment for thyroid disease? (Brand names, Generic names)

R0_ThyroidTreatment_Age.name: R0_ThyroidTreatment_Yrs
R0_ThyroidTreatment_Age.question: At what age did you start the [ordinal] thyroid treatment?
R0_ThyroidTreatment_Age.description: Age (in years) when this thyroid treatment episode began.

R0_ThyroidTreatment_Yrs.name: R0_ThyroidTreatment_Yrs
R0_ThyroidTreatment_Yrs.question: How long did you take the [ordinal] treatment for thyroid? - Years
R0_ThyroidTreatment_Yrs.description: Duration of this thyroid treatment episode in whole years.

R0_ThyroidTreatment_Mnths.name: R0_ThyroidTreatment_Mnths
R0_ThyroidTreatment_Mnths.question: How long did you take the [ordinal] treatment for thyroid? - Months
R0_ThyroidTreatment_Mnths.description: Additional duration of this thyroid treatment episode in whole months.

R0_ThyroidTreatment_Still.name: R0_ThyroidTreatment_Still
R0_ThyroidTreatment_Still.question: Are you still using the [ordinal] treatment for thyroid?
R0_ThyroidTreatment_Still.description: Whether this thyroid treatment episode is ongoing at the time of questionnaire completion.

R0_ThyroidTreatment_MoreTwo.name: Q8_3_more
R0_ThyroidTreatment_MoreTwo.question: Have you taken more than two thyroid drug treatments or used them in more than two episodes?
R0_ThyroidTreatment_MoreTwo.description: Indicator that the participant's thyroid treatment history exceeds two distinct treatment episodes.
enumDescriptions: 1: More than two thyroid drug treatments or used them in more than two episodes

R0_Blind.name: Q8_4_1
R0_Blind.question: Are you registered as blind or partially sighted?
R0_Blind.description: Self-report of registration status for blindness or partial sight.

R0_Gallstones.name: Q8_5_1_1

R0_Gallstones.description: Self-reported history of medically diagnosed gallstones.

R0_Gallstones_Age.description: Age (in completed years) when gallstones were first diagnosed.

R0_Cholecystectomy_Age.question: If yes, at what age was your gallbladder removed?

R0_BrokenHip.name: Q8_7_1_1
R0_BrokenHip.question: Have you ever been told by a doctor that you had a broken (fractured) hip?
R0_BrokenHip.description: Self-reported history of a doctor-diagnosed hip fracture.

R0_BrokenHip_Yr.name: Q8_7_2

R0_BrokenHip_Age.question: If yes, at what age did you break your hip for the first time?
R0_BrokenHip_Age.description: Age (in completed years) at the first hip fracture.

R0_EatingDisorder.name: Q8_8_1_1
R0_EatingDisorder.question: Have you ever had an eating disorder for which you saw your doctor or that caused you to temporarily lose your periods?
R0_EatingDisorder.description: Categorical indicator of eating disorder history, including whether it involved medical consultation and/or temporary amenorrhea.
enumDescriptions: 4: Consulted a doctor and periods temporarily stopped
5: Yes, but did not consult a doctor or lose periods (or not stated)

EatingDisorderEpisodes.name: EatingDisorderEpisodes
